She is also a visiting researcher affiliated with the Noble Group at the University of Oxford. She obtained her Ph.D. degree in the Department of Electrical Engineering at City University of Hong Kong in 2022 and received her B.Eng. degree from Beihang University in 2018. Her research interest is in the interdisciplinary field of AI and healthcare, aiming to create innovative intelligent systems that can support high-quality human-machine interaction/collaboration and trustworthy clinical decision-making. In AI and medical imaging fields, she has published over 40 top journal and conference papers, e.g., Nature Biomedical Engineering, TPAMI, IJCV, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, TMI, MedIA, MICCAI, IPMI, and Nature.
